Posts.Content: Colorfulcasey wrote: Hi ladies - I wanted to let the community know my mom, Cathy2, passed away yesterday morning in her sleep. She fought a brave fight for three years and she is no longer in pain. I want to thank the women in this community who were such a source of comfort for my mother when she felt no one else in the world could understand what she was going through. God bless you all.Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cathy2 Colorfulcasey Linda-n3
